name: Senior Business Analyst
description:
Responsibilities:
  • To take part in projects of IT systems implementation and process optimization as a business analyst and change agent
  • To investigate and document business systems ("as is" processes, organizational structure, IT systems)
  • To identify business needs and provide solutions for business systems improvement
  • To detect, collect, analyze and document business requirements
  • To facilitate communication and decision-making on process and system issues
  • To provide presentations to Stakeholders and Subject matter experts on proposed solutions
  • To coordinate and support change management process
  • To create and document instructions and regulations
  • To provide user trainings
  • To support users on process and IT system issues
  • To set up and monitor hardware, software, service requests execution for business departments
  • To conduct business software, hardware market analysis and evaluate applicability of solutions for business departments
  • To coordinate work with IT product teams.
Requirments:

  • Higher technical / economic / business informatics / management education

  • Additional education would be a plus (e.g. in project management, BI analytics)

  • Required work experience: more than four years as a business analyst / consultant; participation in business/ IT projects as an analyst

  • High communication skills and analytical mind

  • Possess strong analytical thinking skills in relation to process engineering, IT systems and/or project management

  • Willing to work on the result, be proactive, responsible, creative

  • To know business process concepts (BPM), business analysis techniques

  • To know procedures of project management

  • To have experience in process analysis, requirements engineering and documentation

  • To have experience in process automation and systems implementation (PLM or ERP implementation experience will be regarded as an advantage)

  • Experience in working with group dynamics. Preferably through providing training or project management - good presentation skills

  • Management experience (small groups) - nice to have

  • To know UML and have an experience of ER-diagrams creation

  • Experience in working with big sets of data

  • Willing to develop himself/herself in data analytics

  • English: intermediate

  • MS Office Word; MS Office Excel; MS Office PowerPoint; MS Office Visio; MS Office Project; ARIS Business Designer; MS SQL; Atlassian Jira.

We offer:
  • Russian labor law complience
  • Wide range of benefits: discounts on company's product and discount programs with our partners, medical insurance, mobile services discounts etc.
  • Flexible working hours: 8-17, 9-18, 10-19.
